name: CoaxLoss
0:
”Alexa, run coax loss”
”Alexa, ask coax loss what is the loss using RG58 at 144 megahertz”
”Alexa, ask coax loss for help”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: coax loss
des: All feedlines have losses but for your application are the losses a problem? This skill give the loss in dB per 100' for several popular coaxial feedlines at frequencies from 1 megahertz to 1000 megahertz. Losses are generally conservative approximations. For more accuracy please consult the ARRL handbook or similar publications.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
